forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain...a thunderstorm or two as well. High 17C. Winds SW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain...a thunderstorm or two as well. High 63F. Winds SW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with mostly cloudy conditions overnight. Low 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early with some clearing overnight. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
